title: Cellulose carbamates via transcarbamoylation/transurethanization of methyl carbamates in superbase–acid conjugate ionic liquids
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23118-23128
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04521A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Aleksandar R. Todorov, Magdalena Dryś, Eva Gazagnaire, Manisha Podder, Ilkka Kilpeläinen
Herein, we present a sustainable homogeneous protocol for cellulose carbamoylation with methyl N-substituted carbamates in the presence of superbase ionic liquids.
